author: Dan S
title: Awful hotel
text:
I would rate this hotel 0 stars but I can't, stayed here for three nights and it was shockingly bad, the first 2 nights we hardly had any sleep through loud groups of teenagers running and screaming down the corridors and banging doors which was not attended to by staff after reporting it.
As I returned back to my room the third night I came back to find my eye drops and orthodontic retainer taken from my room I reported this but this was hard as not many of the staff spoke English they fobbed me off saying their staff are trained housekeepers and don't touch guest belongings, not only did they take my essential items that I need to maintain my eye sight and teeth structure they didn't remove any rubbish from our room nor did we have clean towels.
The vending machines take your money and do not give out the item and that is dismissed by staff and the machines are left to keep taking people's money.
I would urge everyone to avoid this hotel as they are rude and careless and just want your money, worst hotel experience I have ever had
